hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT *, ychgs + fjhgs AS hgs , CASE WHEN ychgs + fjhgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (ychgs + fjhgs) / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS hgl , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * ychgs / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) AS ychgl , CASE WHEN fjhgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * fjhgs / (1.0 * (zsl - ychgs)), 5, 5) * 100) END AS fjhgl, zsl - (ychgs + fjhgs) AS bhgs , CASE WHEN zsl - (ychgs + fjhgs) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (zsl - (ychgs + fjhgs)) / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS bhgl FROM ( SELECT t1.cllx, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS ychgs , CASE WHEN t3.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t3.zsl END AS fjhgs FROM ( SELECT t1.cllx, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t1 WHERE t1.jyjl IS NOT NULL AND t1.dlsj <=:end AND t1.dlsj >=:begin GROUP BY t1.cllx ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.cllx, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t2 WHERE ( t2.jycs = 1 AND t2.jyjl = '合格' AND t2.dlsj <=:end AND t2.dlsj >=:begin) GROUP BY t2.cllx ) t2 ON t1.cllx = t2.cllx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.cllx, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t2 WHERE ( t2.jycs > 1 AND t2.jyjl = '合格' AND t2.dlsj <=:end AND t2.dlsj >=:begin ) GROUP BY t2.cllx ) t3 ON t3.cllx = t1.cllx ) t

SELECT *, ychgs + fjhgs AS hgs , CASE WHEN ychgs + fjhgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (ychgs + fjhgs) / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS hgl , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * ychgs / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) AS ychgl , CASE WHEN fjhgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * fjhgs / (1.0 * (zsl - ychgs)), 5, 5) * 100) END AS fjhgl, zsl - (ychgs + fjhgs) AS bhgs , CASE WHEN zsl - (ychgs + fjhgs) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (zsl - (ychgs + fjhgs)) / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS bhgl FROM ( SELECT t1.jylb, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS ychgs , CASE WHEN t3.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t3.zsl END AS fjhgs FROM ( SELECT t1.jylb, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t1 WHERE t1.jyjl IS NOT NULL AND t1.dlsj <=:end AND t1.dlsj >=:begin GROUP BY t1.jylb ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.jylb, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t2 WHERE t2.jycs = 1 AND t2.jyjl = '合格' AND t2.dlsj <=:end AND t2.dlsj >=:begin GROUP BY t2.jylb ) t2 ON t1.jylb = t2.jylb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.jylb, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t2 WHERE t2.jycs > 1 AND t2.jyjl = '合格' AND t2.dlsj <=:end AND t2.dlsj >=:begin GROUP BY t2.jylb ) t3 ON t3.jylb = t1.jylb ) t

SELECT *, ychgs + ycfjhgs AS hgs , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * ychgs / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) AS ychgl , CASE WHEN ycfjhgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * ycfjhgs / (1.0 * (zsl - ychgs)), 5, 5) * 100) END AS ycfjhgl , CASE WHEN ecfjhgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * ecfjhgs / (1.0 * (zsl - (ychgs + ycfjhgs))), 5, 5) * 100) END AS ecfjhgl , CASE WHEN scfjhgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * scfjhgs / (1.0 * (zsl - (ychgs + ycfjhgs + ecfjhgs))), 5, 5) * 100) END AS scfjhgl FROM ( SELECT t1.jcxdh, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS ychgs , CASE WHEN t3.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t3.zsl END AS ycfjhgs , CASE WHEN t4.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t4.zsl END AS ecfjhgs , CASE WHEN t5.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t5.zsl END AS scfjhgs FROM ( SELECT t1.jcxdh, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t1 WHERE (t1.jyjl IS NOT NULL AND t1.dlsj <= :end AND t1.dlsj >= :begin) GROUP BY t1.jcxdh ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.jcxdh, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t2 WHERE (t2.jycs = 1 AND t2.jyjl = '合格' AND t2.dlsj <= :end AND t2.dlsj >= :begin) GROUP BY t2.jcxdh ) t2 ON t1.jcxdh = t2.jcxdh LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t3.jcxdh, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t3 WHERE (t3.jycs = 2 AND t3.jyjl = '合格' AND t3.dlsj <= :end AND t3.dlsj >= :begin) GROUP BY t3.jcxdh ) t3 ON t3.jcxdh = t1.jcxdh LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t4.jcxdh, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t4 WHERE (t4.jycs = 3 AND t4.jyjl = '合格' AND t4.dlsj <= :end AND t4.dlsj >= :begin) GROUP BY t4.jcxdh ) t4 ON t4.jcxdh = t1.jcxdh LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t5.jcxdh, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t5 WHERE (t5.jycs > 3 AND t5.jyjl = '合格' AND t5.dlsj <= :end AND t5.dlsj >= :begin) GROUP BY t5.jcxdh ) t5 ON t5.jcxdh = t1.jcxdh ) t

SELECT t.jyxm, t.zsl AS zsl, t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl AS hgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS hgl, t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) AS bhgs , CASE WHEN t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl)) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS bhgl, t.cjhgsl AS ychgs , CASE WHEN t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * t.cjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS ychgl, t.fjhgsl AS fjhgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(t.fjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl - t.cjhgsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS fjhgl FROM ( SELECT t1.jyxm, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS cjhgsl , CASE WHEN t3.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t3.zsl END AS fjhgsl FROM ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_BrakRollerData WHERE zpd IN ('1', '2') GROUP BY jyxm ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_BrakRollerData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs = 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t2 ON t1.jyxm = t2.jyxm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_BrakRollerData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs > 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t3 ON t1.jyxm = t3.jyxm ) t UNION SELECT t.jyxm, t.zsl AS zsl, t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl AS hgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS hgl, t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) AS bhgs , CASE WHEN t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl)) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS bhgl, t.cjhgsl AS ychgs , CASE WHEN t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * t.cjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS ychgl, t.fjhgsl AS fjhgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(t.fjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl - t.cjhgsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS fjhgl FROM ( SELECT t1.jyxm, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS cjhgsl , CASE WHEN t3.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t3.zsl END AS fjhgsl FROM ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_LightData WHERE zpd IN ('1', '2') GROUP BY jyxm ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_LightData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs = 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t2 ON t1.jyxm = t2.jyxm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_LightData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs > 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t3 ON t1.jyxm = t3.jyxm ) t UNION SELECT t.jyxm, t.zsl AS zsl, t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl AS hgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS hgl, t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) AS bhgs , CASE WHEN t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl)) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS bhgl, t.cjhgsl AS ychgs , CASE WHEN t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * t.cjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS ychgl, t.fjhgsl AS fjhgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(t.fjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl - t.cjhgsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS fjhgl FROM ( SELECT t1.jyxm, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS cjhgsl , CASE WHEN t3.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t3.zsl END AS fjhgsl FROM ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_SideslipData WHERE zpd IN ('1', '2') GROUP BY jyxm ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_SideslipData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs = 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t2 ON t1.jyxm = t2.jyxm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_SideslipData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs > 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t3 ON t1.jyxm = t3.jyxm ) t UNION SELECT t.jyxm, t.zsl AS zsl, t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl AS hgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS hgl, t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) AS bhgs , CASE WHEN t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (t.zsl - (t.fjhgsl + t.cjhgsl)) / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS bhgl, t.cjhgsl AS ychgs , CASE WHEN t.cjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * t.cjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS ychgl, t.fjhgsl AS fjhgs , CASE WHEN t.fjhgsl = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(t.fjhgsl / (1.0 * t.zsl - t.cjhgsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS fjhgl FROM ( SELECT t1.jyxm, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS cjhgsl , CASE WHEN t3.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t3.zsl END AS fjhgsl FROM ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_SpeedData WHERE zpd IN ('1', '2') GROUP BY jyxm ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_SpeedData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs = 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t2 ON t1.jyxm = t2.jyxm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jyxm, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_SpeedData WHERE zpd = 1 AND jycs > 1 GROUP BY jyxm ) t3 ON t1.jyxm = t3.jyxm ) t

SELECT t.* , CASE WHEN hgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * hgs / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS hgl , CASE WHEN zsl - hgs = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), round(1.0 * (zsl - hgs) / (1.0 * zsl), 5, 5) * 100) END AS bhgl, t.zsl - t.hgs AS bhgs FROM ( SELECT t1.cllx, t1.zsl , CASE WHEN t2.zsl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.zsl END AS hgs, t1.ycy FROM ( SELECT t1.ycy, t1.cllx, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t1 WHERE t1.jyjl IS NOT NULL AND t1.dlsj <=:end AND t1.dlsj >=:begin GROUP BY t1.ycy, t1.cllx ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.ycy, t2.cllx, COUNT(1) AS zsl FROM TM_VehCheckLogin t2 WHERE t2.jyjl = '合格' AND t2.dlsj <=:end AND t2.dlsj >=:begin GROUP BY t2.ycy, t2.cllx ) t2 ON t1.cllx = t2.cllx AND t1.ycy = t2.ycy ) t

select wjy as ry,COUNT(1) as cc,'外检员' as type from v_gzl where wjy is not null and createTime between :beginDate and :endDate group by wjy union all select dpjyy as ry,COUNT(1) as cc,'底盘检测员' as type from v_gzl where dpjyy is not null and createTime between :beginDate and :endDate group by dpjyy union all select dtjyy as ry,COUNT(1) as cc,'动态检验员' as type from v_gzl where dtjyy is not null and createTime between :beginDate and :endDate group by dtjyy union all select ycy as ry,COUNT(1) as cc,'引车员' as type from TM_VehCheckLogin where ycy is not null and ycy!='' and createTime between :beginDate and :endDate group by ycy union all select dly as ry,COUNT(1) as cc,'登陆员' as type from TM_VehCheckLogin where dly is not null and ycy!='' and createTime between :beginDate and :endDate group by dly
